content:
Rom-coms are always a great choice for a fun and feel-good movie night!

With Amazon Prime and Netflix, you've got access to a vast library of romantic comedies. Here are some recent and popular options that fit your 2-hour time frame:

**On Amazon Prime:**

1. **The Kissing Booth 2** (2020) - A sweet and lighthearted sequel to the original, following Elle and Noah's relationship as they navigate college and new challenges.
2. **Chemical Hearts** (2020) - A charming and emotional romance about two high school students who fall in love and learn to cope with their past traumas.
3. **Tramps** (2016) - A quirky and offbeat rom-com about two young people who meet while on a wild adventure in New York City.

**On Netflix:**

1. **To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love You** (2020) - The sequel to the beloved original, following Lara Jean and Peter's relationship as they navigate new challenges and old flames.
2. **The Lovebirds** (2020) - A fun and witty rom-com starring Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani as a couple on the brink of breaking up, who get caught up in a wild adventure.
3. **Holidate** (2020) - A funny and relatable movie about two people who are tired of being single during the holidays, and agree to be each other's platonic dates for a year.

All of these options are around 1.5-2 hours long, so you can pick the one that suits your mood and preferences!

Hope you enjoy your movie night!
